title: Add option to turn off Christmas Rift (Snow map)
body: Ever since the Christmas Rift came out, i stopped playing normals. The snow dropped my FPS hard, from 50-60 to 30-40. This also hurts the hell out of my eyes.  Please add an option to turn off the Christmas theme! Thx Rito

So pretty much you don't play ARAM? Since that has snow and all that.
If you don't play any games modes except Normals, then why are you playing League? That's totally boring, you know.
And besides, color can change how certain Champs play based on their own colors. Going and playing passively because you see your ally Shockblade Zed creeping up on a Champ and warning him not to because you think it's obvious as you see brown and green, when in fact he could have gotten the kill because his white color blended well enough with the WHITE SNOW that it gave him that slight edge over his opponents, is pretty much a great reason as to why this will never happen. He obviously isn't invisible, but because his white color blends in well enough with the snow they are slightly less accurate.
Mainly: color tactics are just as important in League as the Fog of War in terms of visuals. People seeing different colors than others alters perception between those players, essentially creating hidden or unpredictable advantage/disadvantage which absolutely ruins the game. Not to mention that the game would essentially be running two different versions of the same game at the same time (since you're making it an _option_ and not manditory...you're complaining about lag now, just wait till your toaster tries running two different versions of Rumble in a teamfight against the likes of Zyra or Zac or Jax.
Just. NO.
